title: Mac Windowed Mode Help!
body:
Hey People!

I tried to go out of fullscreen during game in the newest update to the game (using the alt+enter keystroke) and the client crashed. Now it will open the client and i can look at the menus but when the game tries to load it crashes and pulls up the bug reporter. I tried letting it load and doing the keystroke again but it crashes before the game loads. I can't change it in the config file cause I can't find that and I have no idea what is going on. Any help would be great.

I just wanted to play and watch march madness.

replies.body:
If alt+enter doesn't seem to do anything but crash the game (rip) you can always try switching to windowed mode from the in-game settings. 

Enter into a Custom Game - > Press escape -> click the Video tab -> Select Windowed from the drop box at the top right

Let me know if that helps!
